name: v3.5.2
highlights: New Next.js Storefront option in @vendure/create • Drag-drop collection reordering • Order modification surcharges • Major perf fix for self-referencing entities • Postgres scheduled task fix

name: v3.5.1
highlights: Dashboard extension localization support • Fixed @swc/core compilation issues • Windows compilation improvements • compatibilityMode no longer required

name: v3.5.0
highlights: Dashboard stable release! React + Tailwind + Shadcn/ui • New CLI 'schema' command for GraphQL generation • Improved monorepo support • SettingsStore read/write permissions • SentryPlugin migration to @sentry/nestjs

name: v3.4.4
highlights: Fix Order.customFields saving on price adjustments • Package resolution fix in monorepos

name: v3.4.3
highlights: Critical dependency fix for @vendure/core install issue • Apollo Server conflict resolution • Dashboard variant table improvements • Asset focal point fixes

name: v3.4.2
highlights: SettingsStoreService API standardization (ctx arg position) • CollectionEvent emission fix • Stale lock handling for scheduled tasks • Dashboard form components refactor

name: v3.4.1
highlights: New Custom Form Components documentation • Dashboard form refactor • Spanish translation fixes • StockMovements type filtering • Scheduled task registration fix

name: v3.4.0
highlights: Dashboard Release Candidate - stable developer APIs! • CLI non-interactive mode for scripting • New Settings Store API for plugin configuration • Near feature-parity with old Admin UI

name: v3.3.8
highlights: Order tracking code display fix • Refund status in order coverage calculation • Windows plugin detection fix • Stripe metadata in createPayment

name: v3.3.7
highlights: Custom field defaults on entity creation • Nested filter ID decoding fix • Multiple fulfillment lines quantity calculation • SelfRefreshingCache documentation

name: v3.3.6
highlights: Spanish translation improvements • Collection visibility fix • UUID entity creation fix • Dashboard RichTextInput import fix • Common utilities export

name: v3.3.5
highlights: Shipping address only for tax zone determination • tsconfig comments allowed in migrate command • Dashboard Windows extension loading fix • Bulk facet value editing fix

name: v3.3.4
highlights: BullMQ job listing 500x performance improvement • New clean-job-queue-index scheduled task • Default scheduler stability improvements • ProductOptionGroup soft-delete handling

name: v3.3.3
highlights: Product/variant columns link to detail pages in order table • Custom fields on activePaymentMethods/activeShippingMethods • Dashboard auth & channel selection fixes • OrderableAsset export

name: v3.3.2
highlights: Telemetry spans for same-class method calls • Enhanced error handling in logger • Dashboard authenticated status race condition fix

name: v3.3.1
highlights: Arabic & French translation improvements • Circular merge-deep stack overflow fix • Klarna payment via Mollie enabled • GraphiQL pnpm asset path fix

name: v3.3.0
highlights: New Dashboard Beta with extension APIs! • Native Scheduled Tasks support with DefaultSchedulerPlugin • New @vendure/telemetry-plugin for OpenTelemetry • New GraphiQL plugin replacing deprecated playground

name: v3.2.4
highlights: Admin UI sendFile absolute paths fix • Proxy middleware v2→v3 migration fix • Circular collection ancestor detection • Password validation maxLength option

name: v3.2.3
highlights: Missing product variant list tab fix • Express v4/v5 types alignment • Express typings relaxation for compatibility

name: v3.2.2
highlights: Dashboard plugin publishing fix

name: v3.2.1
highlights: BullMQ Redis keys custom prefix fix • Sass compilation warnings silenced • Angular v19 compatibility for ui-devkit

name: v3.2.0
highlights: New React Dashboard Alpha Preview! • Major dependency updates: NestJS v11, Express v5, TypeScript v5.8.2, Angular v19 • Performance improvements from dependency upgrades • Public demo at react.demo.vendure.io
